availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert "Bob" P. Gray, Jr. (Caldwell County, Ky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza A. Gresham Gray in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on May 28, 1849. Father of James R. Gray, Estella Gray, and Charles W. Gray. Resident of Caldwell County in 1830. Household owned three enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1830. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Fifth Manuscript Census of the United States (1830), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, p. 166.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 378B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994029, Caldwell County Births, p. 4.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #2904.
Kentucky Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, 1786-1878, Film #000851644, p. 273.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Caldwell County Administrators Bonds, 1863-1878, p. 221.
